name: sludge
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Sludge is hurled to inflict damage. May also poison.
flavor_text.emerald: Sludge is hurled to inflict damage. May also poison.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: Toxic sludge is hurled at the foe. It may poison the target.
